question: Which among the following is incorrect regarding NPA (Non Performing Assets)?
option1: They are loans given by a bank of financial institution where the borrower defaults or delays interest or principle amount
option2: Banks are not allowed to book any income from NPAs
option3: A loan repayment which is delayed beyond 1 year has to be identified as NPA
answer: A loan repayment which is delayed beyond 1 year has to be identified as NPA
explanation: A loan repayment which is delayed beyondÂ  180 days has to be identified as NPA
